download.note: Workflows to run major steps of RNA-Seq and ChIP-Seq data, on provided or custom data.
Steps to finalize data analysis and integrate results.

function.note: RNA-Seq analysis workflow in dockerized Galaxy, input SRA sequences, output matrix of normalized counts and table of DEG.
ChIP-Seq analysis workflow in dockerized Galaxy, input SRA sequences, output called peaks

summary.description: Reproducible Epigenomics Analysis pipeline for the analysis of ChIP-Seq and RNA-Seq data using Docker images containing Galaxy and Jupyter. The analysis workflow was originally designed to analyze Brassica rapa data.
summary.name: Epigenomics Workflow on Galaxy and Jupyter
